title: Leaving the gold standard was the ‘most costly mistake we ever made’
summary: According to a poignantly on-point educational video by Bitcoin media company TFCT, which depicts a society in decline, leaving the gold standard was the “most costly mistake we ever made” and the beginning of generational ruin. The video, released to mark the anniversary of Nixon closing the gold window, depicts a grandfather on his porch […] The post Leaving the gold standard was the ‘most costly mistake we ever made’ appeared first on CryptoSlate .
